title: Great Ocean Road Coastal Apartment Getaway
description: Escape with friends or family to beautiful coastal Victoria at the Lady Bay Resort, nestled close to the aquamarine waters of Warrnambool Bay just off the famous Great Ocean Road. Stay in a contemporary self-catering apartment and explore at your leisure, taking in the rugged beauty and charming coastal resorts of the Great Ocean Road. Includes savings on dining and spa treatments, and late check-out.
